sentences.en: "In anthropology, you can't equate third gender with homosexuality, " he said.
sentences.cn: “在人类学中，你不能将同性恋和第三性别混同，”他说。

sentences.en: At that time, I thought homosexuality is what hooligans do .
sentences.cn: 那时候，我认为同性恋都是些流氓痞子。

sentences.en: Lee said he was focusing on traditions of behavior, not homosexuality.
sentences.cn: 李导说他所拍摄的电影主要是沿袭以往的传统色彩, 而并非是以“性”为主色调.

sentences.en: Of course homosexuality is bad for society. If everyone were homosexual, there would be no society.
sentences.cn: 同性恋当然是危害社会的。要是每个人都是同性恋，那就没有社会了。

words.tran_cn: 关心同性恋者权利的；同性恋的（等于homosexual）
同性恋者；同性恋权力支持者
对同性恋的恐惧；对同性恋的憎恶
